revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I am instructed by the President to say, that when the persons against whose property proceedings are pending in the Court at Little Rock, shall present to you pardons, you are fully authorized, if in your judgment it should be done, to discontinue such proceedings, upon any terms not inconsistent with the terms of the pardon.
This authority is to cover all cases, no matter under what Act or Acts of Congress the proceedings may have been instituted.
